Vijay Mallya is considered a Fugitive Economic Offender (FEO): a person for whom an arrest warrant has been issued in connection with the commission of an offence enumerated in the Act that has a minimum financial impact of Rs. 100 crore is called an FEO. Money laundering, forging official stamps or money, dishonouring checks and activities that mislead creditors are some of the offences that are included in the FEO legislation.The Name of the subject is Mehul Choksi

The Central Bureau of Investigation (CBI) this week arrested Chanda Kochhar and her husband, Deepak Kochhar in relation to the Rs 3,000-crore Videocon Group loan scam. There were several other people also booked in the case under the relevant sections of IPC related to criminal conspiracy and provisions of the Prevention of Corruption Act. The Central Bureau of Investigation (CBI) has filed fresh FIR against fugitive diamantaire Mehul Choksi for cheating Canara Bank-led consortium to the tune of 55.27 Cr, officials clarified on Thursday. Nirav Modi's uncle Mehul Choksi was a part of the PNB scam. He was the proprietor of the retail jewellery company Gitanjali Group.
